name: One Dish Lemon Chicken
description: Impress guests with this one-dish favourite. Easy to make and easy to clean up after!

ingredients.name: drumsticks and thighs or 4 breasts, bone-in
red pepper
ingredients.additionalInstruction: seeded, halved then cut into slices

ingredients.name: splash of white wine or water

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 375° F (190° C).
  2. Place chicken pieces in a large baking dish, skin side up.
  3. Arrange potatoes, onions, red pepper and artichoke hearts between pieces of chicken.
  4. Add Nourish Broth, water and/or wine to cover up to 1⁄2" deep.
  5. Juice half lemon over all ingredients. Add olives if desired.
  6. Sprinkle Souvlaki Seasoning over casserole.
  7. Slice second lemon half and layer over chicken.
  8. Roast for 1 hour, basting occasionally.
